CustomField.formula: IF(OFACCode__c = "1", "No Match", IF(OFACCode__c = "2", "Match to full name only", IF(OFACCode__c = "3", "Match to SSN only", IF(OFACCode__c = "4", "Match to name and SSN", IF(OFACCode__c = "5", "Match to name and DOB", IF(OFACCode__c = "6", "Match to name and year of birth", IF(OFACCode__c = "7", "Match to SSN and DOB", IF(OFACCode__c = "8", "Match to SSN and year of birth", IF(OFACCode__c = "9", "Match to name, SSN and DOB", IF(OFACCode__c = "10", "Match to name, SSN and year of birth", IF(OFACCode__c = "11", "Match to company name only", IF(OFACCode__c = "12", "Match to company address only", IF(OFACCode__c = "13", "Match to company name and address", IF(OFACCode__c = "14", "Match to surname and first name - partial or first initial", IF(OFACCode__c = "15", "Match to full name only - PLC SDN list", IF(OFACCode__c = "16", "Match to surname and first initial - PLC SDN list",null ))))))))))))))))
CustomField.label: OFAC Description
